Key Match Events: Randal Kolo Muani scored a soft header on 43 minutes after a sweet center from Mbappé
Marseille defender Jonathan Clauss fired a scorcher into the top corner on 70 minutes to make it 2-0
Substitute Bradley Barcola waltzed around the visiting defense to set Mbappé up on 85 minutes with the Real Madrid bound forward slamming home with conviction
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps praised Kylian Mbappé's performance, stating 'Kylian is a great leader and we need him at his best'
Deschamps also commented on N'Golo Kante's performance, saying 'He was as good as ever. He did himself proud'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Metz, who were relegated from the French top flight in a play off with Saint Etienne, who climbed back into the top flight on Sunday
Others: France take on Canada Sunday in Bordeaux, before their Euro 2024 opener June 17 in Dusseldorf against Austria
